t: Let Us Go to the House of the Lord
A Song of Ascents. Of David.
I*pn was glad when they said to me, “Let*ld us go to the house of the Lord!”*s
Our*ln feet have been standing within*ld your gates, O Jerusalem!
Jerusalem—*pn built as a city that*ld is bound firmly together,
to*ln which the tribes go up, the*ld tribes of the Lord,*s as*ln was decreed for Israel, to*ld give thanks to the name of the Lord.*s
There*ln thrones for judgment were set, the*ld thrones of the house of David.
Pray*pn for the peace of Jerusalem! “May*ld they be secure who love you!
Peace*ln be within your walls and*ld security within your towers!”
For*ln my brothers and companions’ sake I*ld will say, “Peace be within you!”
For*ln the sake of the house of the Lord*s our God, I*ld will seek your good.
